remarks: Commute the arguments of a double sum.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Dec-2014.)
statement:
gsumxp.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
gsumxp.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
gsumxp.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. CMnd ) $.
gsumxp.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
gsumxp.r $e |- ( ph -> C e. W ) $.
gsumcom.f $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( j e. A /\ k e. C ) ) -> X e. B ) $.
gsumcom.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. Fin ) $.
gsumcom.n $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( ( j e. A /\ k e. C ) /\ -. j U k ) ) -> X = .0. ) $.
gsumcom $p |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( j e. A , k e. C |-> X ) ) = ( G gsum ( k e. C , j e. A |-> X ) ) ) $.
$d .0. j k $.
$d A j k $.
$d B j k $.
$d C j k $.
$d G j k $.
$d U j k $.
$d V j $.
$d j k ph $.
